footer.description: Documenting rural life in Mongolia, preserving stories of rural people.

notFound.subtitle: The story you're looking for doesn't exist or has been moved.

about.title: Our Story
about.subtitle: From our website 'STORY TELLERS', we believe that every corner of Mongolia holds unique tales waiting to be told.
about.content: We are students dedicated to exploring and documenting the rich narratives that emerge from rural communities across our beautiful country. Through this project, we aim to bridge the gap between urban and rural experiences, sharing authentic stories that reflect the true spirit of Mongolia.
about.mission: Through this project, we document rural life in Mongolia, preserving the stories of 'Rural People'. We are 7 rural students from 7 provinces writing the stories of our families and friends.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Get in touch with the Story-Capturers team.
